entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the students who left the common room to go to the Defence Against the Dark Arts classroom. He is described as joining Hermione in the queue outside the classroom.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the students who left the common room to go to the Defence Against the Dark Arts classroom. He is described as yawning when Hermione mentions her homework.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the students who was already queuing outside the Defence Against the Dark Arts classroom. She is described as carrying an armful of heavy books and looking put-upon.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the teacher of the Defence Against the Dark Arts class. He is described as stepping into the corridor and imposing his personality on the room.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are mentioned as queuing together outside the Defence Against the Dark Arts classroom.
Ron is talking to Hermione when she mentions her homework.
Harry is a student in Snape's class, and Snape is his teacher.
